import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import whatever from '../../../public/data.json' function Playground() { const [currentStreak, setcurrentStreak] = useState(0) const [questions, setQuestions] = useState([]); const [cardsAnswered, setcardsAnswered] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { fetch('path/to/your/json/file.json') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setQuestions(data.questions)) .catch(error => console.error('Error fetching JSON:', error)); }, []); return (
